<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Setup optimization remarks that output directly to a raw&#95;ostream.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\p OS is managed by the caller and should be open for writing as long as \\p</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Context is streaming remarks to it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a861311f8fc18e2eb0035cccb0b1acaac">setupLLVMOptimizationRemarks</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
